TopicTitle: The Number War: Count to 100 or -100

Articles.Content: -26 Defeating a sandwich only makes it taster -Virginia, Prince of the Super Sands
-27. Say what now?
-28 You am no real super sand.
-29. Whatever, I just read the OP, and yes, the Positive Resistance have yet no chance. We shall vanquish thou into the dark, ever growing void.
-30 And one more message for good measure, to avoid the MoD I must refrain from doing any more atm.

Sorry for the wait - do not worry negatives, your win has been noticed and recorded. OP has been updated and the score is now -8 to 5.

Is there really nothing the positives can do to even up the odds? The negatives are relentless, but surely there are ways to combat even the worst odds...

Sorry for the wait - do not worry negatives, your win has been noticed and recorded. OP has been updated and the score is now -8 to 5.

Is there really nothing the positives can do to even up the odds? The negatives are relentless, but surely there are ways to combat even the worst odds...

The zero team will be our last hope. Only they can restore the balance and bring equilibrium back to this war.

Indeed, my apologies. I was busy with things so I couldn't update fast enough.

Also, PSA to those haven't noticed it: minor change was made a while ago to rule 7 so that it can override over even a winning post. Note that it is only within a 1 minute window and a change of 1 unit, so it is only a very, very slim chance to return from the very brink of losing, but still a chance. Consult the rules for more information.

Edited October 6, 2015 by RainDreamer
-32 (to those cheering for the positives) this is not the number you're looking for...

-36 one step at a time

-34 oops

i feel bad for reviving this monster when it was arround -30
